original_text: Your gift of money will show people that you really want to help. People will say that God is great. They will see that you want to obey God. They will see that you are happy to give to them, and to everyone else. They will see that you really believe the good news about Christ, as you say you do.
korean_text: 이 직무로 증거를 삼아 너희가 그리스도의 복음을 진실히 믿고 복종하는 것과 그들과 모든 사람을 섬기는 너희의 후한 연보로 말미암아 하나님께 영광을 돌리고

sentences.original_text: Your gift of money will show people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 돈 선물은 사람들에게 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that you really want to help
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 정말로 돕고 싶어 한다는 것을

sentences.original_text: People will say that God is great
They will see that you want to obey God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 하나님께 순종하고 싶어 한다는 것을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will see that you are happy to give to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 그들에게 주는 것을 기뻐한다는 것을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will see that you really believe
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 정말로 믿는다는 것을 볼 것입니다
